Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 11th overall pick, by Philadelphia in 2017...
Released by Philadelphia on 3/2/2017...
Signed as a free agent by Philadelphia on 3/2/2017 to a minor league deal...
Injured on 6/15/2017 with a Inflamed Thigh Muscle, out for 1-2 weeks...
Traded from Philadelphia to Houston on 3/2/2020 (Going to HOU: CF Hugh Lalonde, C James Howell, C Juan Forest. Going to PHI: 3B Tyler Gauna)...
Had first career hit on 4/1/2020, off Erik Boyce (SEA)...
Hit first career homerun on 4/9/2020, off Maels Tomas (BRO)...
Won Gold Glove at Catcher in 2022...
Injured on 6/12/2023 with a Strained Groin Muscle, out for one week...
Signed as a free agent by Brooklyn on 2/25/2025 to a 1-year deal worth $1,000,000 per year...
